Uses of Interface
de.hu.gralog.structure.event.SelectionListener

Packages that use SelectionListener
de.hu.gralog.structure.support Defines various helper classes that are used by GrALoG-Structures to provide their functionality. 
 

Uses of SelectionListener in de.hu.gralog.structure.support
 

Methods in de.hu.gralog.structure.support with parameters of type SelectionListener
 void StructureSelectionSupport.addSelectionListener(SelectionListener<V,E> l)
          Adds a SelectionListener to this class that is informed whenever the user changes his selection of elements ( vertices / edges ) for the GrALoG-Structure this instance belongs to.
 void StructureSelectionSupport.removeSelectionListener(SelectionListener<V,E> l)
          Removes a SelectionListener from this class.
